description:
The long shaft on this axe delivers a bit more heft for camp chores. It's also hollow, so it's light enough to bring in a pack or on a canoe trip. The plastic edge cover secures with a rotating clip and makes a great handle, lash point, or way to hang the hatchet when not in use.

  • Tempered and forged steel holds an edge for a long time
  • Fibreglass-reinforced polymer shaft is moulded around the head
  • Overall length is 35.24cm
  • Blade length is 6.7cm
name: Fiskars X7 Hatchet
